com.robapp.behaviors.executions

Class ContextManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.robapp.behaviors.executions.ContextManager

  • public class ContextManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The context manager is used for dispatching events and managing execution context for behaviors and handlers Created by Arthur on 09/12/2016.
